classifier

Class SingleFileWordCount

  • java.lang.Object
    • classifier.SingleFileWordCount

  • public class SingleFileWordCount
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aims to count all the words and its occurrences of one file. Result will be stored in HashMap. Refactor from Classifier.java and CountFrequency.java.
    Version:
    5
    Author:
    zfang6

      • SingleFileWordCount

        public SingleFileWordCount(java.lang.String category,
                   java.lang.String filePath,
                   java.lang.String outputPath)
        Instantiates a new single file word count. Give the input file path and category, output the words and their corresponding occurrences to the outputPath given
        Parameters:
        category - the category
        filePath - the file path
        outputPath - the output path

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getCountTable()
        Gets the count table. Word count table for this document. Key: word; Value: occurrences
        Returns:
        the word frequency count table

      • getWordsNum

        public int getWordsNum()
        Gets the words num. Number of words this documents contains. Only includes words consists of a-z, A-Z, "-" or "_"
        Returns:
        the words number
